data.name: Milliopoly - Language Quiz and Learning
data.detailed_description:
Become a millionaire by using your language knowledge. Invite your friends and family and practice your own native language or foreign ones!

Ranked mode
Put your knowledge to the test, with limited time for questions, and demonstrate complete mastery of the languages you select. At the end of each round of questions, you will be ranked according to your performance.

Custom mode
Select which languages and which categories of each language you want to practice. Choose how many questions you want to answer and how much time you want to answer each question. As in ranked mode, questions will be shown randomly, between 8 and 20 per round. You will see your final result, points, and the coins you earn!

Languages available: English, Spanish and Portuguese.

Coming soon:
The full version will have more languages (such as French and Italian), modes, and options. Local and online multiplayer modes are under development, and hopefully, the game will have them soon.

The experience you might expect is to be able to practice a range of at least 10 languages, simultaneously or not, in different aspects (such as grammar, vocabulary, reading comprehension, the cultures of the countries in which they're spoken, listening comprehension, geography, linguistic variations and more), exploring basic, intermediate and advanced levels, clicking, typing, rearranging and maybe speaking.

The game is supposed to be fun to play with friends or family members interested in languages. It's meant for students in language institutes from around the world, teachers, translators, and anyone who wants to learn, practice, improve or simply have fun with wither their own native language or foreign ones.

You should learn and/or practice the differences between Portuguese from Brazil and from Portugal (and from Angola, Mozambique, etc.), the multiple varieties of the Spanish language, the English language, and others that get to be added.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
